title: Plastic Straws: The Good, The Bad and The Ugly - RighteousFoods
body: As a consequence, plastic straws are almost always discarded and sent to landfills. Straws are everywhere. Plastic straws are more prevalent than every other item on the list above. 500 million straws are used and discarded every day in the United States alone. This number contributes to an overall statistic of over 175 billion straws entering ...
